# Yadav et al. / IP Indian Journal of Immunology and Respiratory Medicine 2024;9(2):85–87

## Abstract
The integration of artificial intelligence (AI) into tuberculosis (TB) diagnosis presents a transformative opportunity to enhance diagnostic accuracy and efficiency. This paper discusses the benefits and challenges of AI applications in TB diagnosis, including automated detection of TB lesions, genomic analysis, and clinical decision support systems.

## Introduction
Tuberculosis remains a significant global health challenge, with traditional diagnostic methods often being time-consuming and resource-intensive. The need for innovative approaches to improve diagnostic efficiency is urgent.

# Artiﬁcial Intelligence in Tuberculosis Diagnosis: Revolutionizing Detection and Treatment

## Abstract
In recent years, artificial intelligence (AI) has emerged as a transformative force in various fields, including healthcare. This paper explores the potential of AI in revolutionizing tuberculosis (TB) diagnosis, addressing traditional diagnostic challenges, and improving patient outcomes. By leveraging AI's capabilities in data analysis, pattern recognition, and decision support, we can envision a future where TB diagnosis is more accurate, timely, equitable, and accessible to all populations.

## Introduction
Tuberculosis remains one of the oldest known infectious diseases, posing significant public health challenges globally. Traditional diagnostic methods often fall short in terms of speed, accuracy, and accessibility. The integration of AI into TB diagnostics presents an opportunity to overcome these challenges and enhance the overall effectiveness of TB management.
